channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Update Cliff Rescue; INC#0133; 02:50AM; 807 W Paseo Del Mar; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3bdMymN" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3bdMymN</a>; #SanPedro; *Corrections* Due to deteriorating conditions and visibility, Air Operations was unable to assist with the body recovery. Firefighters on the ground are performing a second land-based rope rescue to recover the deceased individual.; FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; AO1 BC4 BC6 BT1 BT2 BT5 E101 E112 E203 E248 E285 E48 E5 E85 EM13 H1 H5 HA1 HA5 RA101 RA112 RA36 RA5 RA85 RH114 T3 T48 T85 UR5 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

Cliff Rescue; INC#0133; 01:44AM; 807 W Paseo Del Mar; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3bdMymN" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3bdMymN</a>; #SanPedro; Firefighters responded to Point Fermin to find one person deceased near the bottom of the cliffs, and one person in need of medical attention and rescue part-way down. Firefighters set up a rescue rope system to access, treat, and remove the person. Firefighters will be transporting one to the hospital. Air operations will be assisting with body recovery after the land-based rescue is complete. Unknown age/gender.; FS 48; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; AO1 BC4 BC6 BT1 BT2 BT5 E101 E112 E203 E248 E285 E48 E5 E85 EM13 H1 H5 HA1 HA5 RA101 RA112 RA36 RA5 RA85 RH114 T3 T48 T85 UR5 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1960; 12:17AM; 7406 S Figueroa St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4bYpl6r" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4bYpl6r</a>; #VermontKnolls; Firefighters arrived to find a two-story apartment building (site of previous burns) with fire through the roof. Firefighters briefly began the fire fight in defensive mode, applying hose streams from the exterior only, and quickly transitioned to offensive mode to get inside and apply water directly to the seat of the fire. Ultimately, it took 46 firefighters 22 minutes to extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E21 E221 E264 E266 E57 E64 E66 RA33 RA57 SQ21 T21 T64 T66; CH7; 15; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1960; 11:55PM; 7406 S Figueroa St; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4bYpl6r" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4bYpl6r</a>; #VermontKnolls; PRELIM: Two-story apartment building with fire through the roof. Defensive mode.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E21 E221 E264 E266 E57 E64 E66 RA33 RA57 SQ21 T21 T64 T66; CH9; 15; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#1674; 08:46PM; 10617 S Wilmington Av; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4eA2e3M" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4eA2e3M</a>; #Watts; 32 LAFD Firefighters took just 30 minutes (9:16 PM) to access, confine and fully extinguish stubborn flames within one upstairs unit of a two-story residential duplex. No injury. Ten persons from multiple families living in the involved apartment unit will be displaced by the fire. American Red Cross Disaster Action Team Volunteers are en route to assist them with immediate needs. The fire's cause is under active investigation.; FS 65; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 15; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 BC18 BC4 CM20 CM22 E14 E17 E203 E209 E221 E233 E264 E266 E3 E33 E5 E64 E65 EM1 EM13 FR64 HR3 RA64 RA65 RA864 RA865 SO1 SQ21 T21 T3 T33 T64 T66 T9 UR3 UR88; CH7; 12 13; Brian Humphrey

Hiker Rescue; INC#0709; 11:08AM; Topanga State Park; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/3XpegGV" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/3XpegGV</a>; #PacificPalisades; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response to a 72 year-old male hiker with head trauma after he fell on a remote section of the Backbone Trail near Rivas Canyon. An LAFD Rescue Helicopter has lowered a Flight Paramedic to medically assess and stabilize the patient, who will soon be hoisted along with the LAFD Flight Paramedic into the hovering helicopter for continuing in-flight care during direct air transport to an area hospital.; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; AO1 BC9 E19 E269 H1 H7 HA1 HA7 RA19 RH114 T69; CH7; 13; Brian Humphrey

Agency Assist; INC#1141; 03:03PM; Lopez Canyon; MAP: <a href="https://maps.app.goo.gl/zyD266CHvZ54Tt8M9" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://maps.app.goo.gl/zyD266CHvZ54Tt8M9</a>; #AngelesNationalForest; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response with Los Angeles County (LACoFD) and Angeles National Forest (ANF) Firefighters in Automatic Aid to the "Lopez Fire", a vegetation fire near Lopez Canyon Road, in a Mutual Threat Zone within the Angeles National Forest near the three agencies' common border. This fire is outside the City of Los Angeles, and no City of Los Angeles residents are currently threatened. All Media Inquiries should be directed to Angeles National Forest Public Information Officer(s).; Council District Outside the City of Los Angeles; AO1 AO2 BC12 BC14 E24 E274 E275 E290 E298 E7 E91 E98 EM12 H3 H5 H7 HA3 HA5 HA7 RA98 SO1 T74 T75 T90 T98 + LACoFD + ANF; CH5; 17; Brian Humphrey

Update Structure Fire; INC#1226; 04:45PM; 12601 W Van Nuys Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4b2eqac" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4b2eqac</a>; #Pacoima; LAFD Firefighters systematically searching in the smoke-charged two story townhome quickly found and began resuscitative efforts on the two limp and apparently lifeless pet cats. Their perseverant efforts continued outdoors with the provision of medical oxygen and physical stimulation that soon restored their breathing and consciousness. The felines have been taken by their owner to a nearby emergency veterinarian, with a very promising outlook. There were no other human or animal injuries. No other animals are reported missing. The cause of the fire, which heavily damaged the kitchen, remains under investigation.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 E275 E298 E75 E77 E98 EM12 RA77 RA87 RA898 T75 T98; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1226; 03:44PM; 12601 W Van Nuys Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4b2eqac" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4b2eqac</a>; #Pacoima; First arriving 12 LAFD Firefighters took just 13 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish fire involving a dishwasher in the second floor kitchen area of a of a two-story townhome. No human injury. Firefighters continue a methodic search of the smoke-charged premises for pet felines.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 E275 E298 E75 E77 E98 EM12 RA77 RA87 RA898 T75 T98; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1226; 03:31PM; 12601 W Van Nuys Bl; MAP: <a href="https://bit.ly/4b2eqac" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://bit.ly/4b2eqac</a>; #Pacoima; PRELIM: Kitchen fire in one unit of a two-story (combination garden-style/center-hallway style) apartment building.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC10 BC12 E275 E298 E75 E77 E98 EM12 RA77 RA87 RA898 T75 T98; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey
